intro_only_event_multi_5_anniversary_log: Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

There’s a festival being held on Pasio, and we’re
all celebrating!

It’s a great opportunity for both people and
Pokémon to have fun. I hope you have the chance
to do so yourself, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Lear’s REALLY hyped about it—even more so than
usual! There’s something special about this year!

I’m so happy that ALL of Pasio is getting geared
up for it!
Are you ready, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I hope you have a fun and wonderful time!
Heya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You enjoying the festival? We are, of course.
Everyone’s really interested in those arc suits!

Yeah. Looks like some of the Champions have
REALLY upped their game.

Hahaha! Looks like Red’s really curious about them,
too!
How about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Then how about we have a little competition to
see which of us can take down a Champion
wearing their arc suit?
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you enjoying the festival?

...Hm? Everyone is really interested in our
arc suits?

I see! It makes me a bit proud to hear that we’re
garnering attention!

I’m glad that our new brilliance is something Pasio
can get excited about!

*chuckle* I’m sure you must also be interested in
seeing our arc suits, huh,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
So, as a special treat...

This is the true power of the sync stones ultimate,
made possible by fostering the ultimate bond
between people and Pokémon!

I’m looking forward to battling you in this outfit,
without holding anything back!

Please enjoy the rest of your time at the festival,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
